{%- macro add_header(page_num, max_pages, doc, letter_head, no_letterhead) -%} {% if letter_head and not no_letterhead %}
{{ letter_head if letter_head else '' }}
{% endif %} {%- endmacro -%}
{{ add_header(0, 1, doc, letter_head, no_letterhead) if add_header(0, 1, doc, letter_head, no_letterhead) else '' }}
{% set employee = frappe.get_doc("Employee",doc.applicant) %} {% set installment_details = frappe.get_all("Loan Repayment Schedule", filters={"docstatus":1,"loan":doc.name}, fields=['*']) %}
LOAN AGREEMENT

Between
{{ employee.salutation }}. {{ employee.employee_name }} (The Borrower)
and
{{ doc.company }} (The Lender)

THIS AGREEMENTis made on {{frappe.format_date(frappe.utils.getdate(),"dd-MM-yyyy")}} in Ahmedabad


The Borrower is an employee of the Lender since {{employee.date_of_joining}} and is presently serving as {{employee.designation}} in {{employee.department}} Department bearing employee code {{employee.employee_number}} at  {{employee.custom_work_location}}.


Borrower has requested to grant Loan to him/her with purpose of {{"CustomAttributes.Purpose"}} which he/she shall repay as per the terms of this Agreement. Lender hereby agrees to grant Loan of ₹ {{ "%.2f"| format(doc.total_payment)}}/- (Rupees {{frappe.utils.money_in_words("%.2f"| format(doc.total_payment))}}) Borrower, in consideration of his/her professional association with the Company in accordance with the terms and condition of this Agreement.


Borrower agrees to repay the Loan installment of ₹ {{ installment_details[0].monthly_repayment_amount if installment_details and installment_details[0] else 'None' }}/- per month starting from {{ frappe.format_date(installment_details[0].repayment_start_date, "MMMM") if installment_details and installment_details[0] else 'None' }} month for {{ installment_details[0].repayment_periods if installment_details and installment_details[0] else 'None' }} consecutive months till {% if installment_details and installment_details[0] %} {% set end_month = frappe.utils.add_months(installment_details[0].repayment_start_date, installment_details[0].repayment_periods) %} {% if end_month.year != installment_details[0].repayment_start_date.year %} {{ frappe.format_date(end_month, "MMMM-yyyy") }} {% else %} {{ end_month.month }} {% endif %} {% else %} None {% endif %} with the deduction from his/her salary.


If employee leaves the organization in between then the loan amount will be fully recovered from his/her full and final settlement.


IN WITNESS WHEREOF the Parties hereto have executed this Agreement on the day and year first above written.

____________
Signed by {{employee.salutation}}. {{employee.employee_name}} 		Borrower
For and on behalf of
{{doc.company}}


Authorized Signatory
Accounts & Finance Dept. 		Lender
{{ footer if footer else '' }}
